title: Log Analysis for Account Compromise
description: An investigator must analyze logs from multiple systems (AD, VPN, O365) to create a timeline of an account compromise.

tasks.description: Gather all relevant logs for the compromised user account for the suspected timeframe of the breach.
tasks.expected_outcome: Investigator successfully collects all necessary log files.

tasks.description: Correlate the timestamps across the different log sources to build a unified timeline of events.
tasks.expected_outcome: Investigator creates a single, chronological timeline of the attacker's actions.

tasks.description: Use the timeline to write a detailed incident report showing how the attacker gained access via VPN, logged into O365, and then sent phishing emails internally.
tasks.expected_outcome: Investigator produces a clear report that explains the full story of the incident.
